name: Lion Fai
description: Lion Fai is an innovative and developmental multi-utility token working to be one of the leading projects in the crypto ecosystem. Lion Fai is a token building a decentralized ecosystem – directed by and towards the crypto community. Our community will not only buy and sell the token, but will also have access to multiple utilities for daily use that can only be accessed through our ecosystem. These include: NFTs, play & earn games, Metaverse, access to networking events, and exclusive content that will only be available through our soon to be released Dapp. ​
